data.TX_RESULT_WAITING_LABEL: This transaction is waiting on action
data.PERSISTENCE_CHECKBOX: Remember this on my device next time
data.HOME_EMPTY_HEADER: There are no transactions in your Signer at this time
data.HOME_EMPTY_SUBHEADING: Initiate a transaction from MyCrypto.com to see it appear here
data.UNLOCK_SUBHEADING: Your MyCrypto Signer is currently locked. Enter your MyCrypto Password to unlock it.
data.KEYSTORE_UPLOAD_PART2: or drop your keystore file here
data.NEW_USER_DESCRIPTION_1: This is a transaction signer that was designed to help you safely approve and sign crypto transactions.
data.NEW_USER_DESCRIPTION_2: In order to keep you secure, you need to create a password that will unlock the app moving forward and protect your info.
data.NEW_USER_DESCRIPTION_3: Keep this password safe. **You will not be able to reset or recover this password if you lose it.**
data.CREATE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION_1: This code word encrypts your data within the MyCrypto Desktop Signer application. Choose a strong but easy-to-remember code word and do not forget it. It's not recoverable. This code word will allow you to sign transactions.
data.CREATE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION_2: After creating your password, please make sure you put it safely back in storage. [Read more]($link)
data.SECRET_WARNING: After entering your key, please make sure you put it safely back in storage. [Read more]($link)
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_END_BODY: You have successfully added your address(es) to the Signer.
data.GENERATE_ACCOUNT_MNEMONIC: Create an Account using a Mnemonic Phrase
data.SETUP_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: You have successfully created your MyCrypto Password. This code word will allow you to sign transactions. Now it's time to add your account.
data.MNEMONIC_DESCRIPTION_2: Back it up on paper or USB drive
data.MNEMONIC_DESCRIPTION_3: Can be written, printed, and easily typed on mobile
data.MNEMONIC_DESCRIPTION_4: Compatible with MetaMask, Jaxx, imToken, and more
data.MNEMONIC_DESCRIPTION_5: Provides unlimited addresses for sending and receiving
data.CREATE_MNEMONIC_PHRASE_DESCRIPTION: Write these words down. **Do not** copy them to your clipboard, or save them anywhere online.
data.VERIFY_MNEMONIC_PHRASE_DESCRIPTION: Three of the words in your mnemonic phrase are randomly displayed below. To verify your phrase, fill in the single words that are in those exact positions.
data.WHAT_IS_NTH_WORD: What is the **$nth word** of your phrase?
data.PAPER_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: Your paper wallet includes everything you need to access this account in the future. [**Keep it safe!** No one can recover this account should you lose your recovery phrase.] [Read more]($link)
data.PAPER_WALLET_PRINTED: My Phrase is on Paper and Stored Safely
data.BLOCKIE_NOTICE: Always look for this icon when sending to this wallet
data.RESET_HEADING: Are you sure you want to reset your password?
data.RESET_DESCRIPTION: Resetting your password will cause you to lose all your saved settings (accounts, saved keys, & transactions).
data.RESET_CANCEL: No, I want to keep my settings
